entry.title: Welch's Cherry Pomegranate Singles To Go - 13g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jel Sert
Type: Snacks
Price: 3.49

Welch's Cherry Pomegranate Singles To Go 

Easy to Make Directions: Sip from a full bottle of water to make room for powder. Pour one packet into a 16.9 fl oz bottle of water (0.5 litres) or a large glass of water. Shake the bottle or mix well until powder dissolves. Mix with a 20 fl oz bottle of water for a milder flavour.

  • Naturally and Artificially Flavored
  • Sugar-Free
  • 10 Packets
  • Low-Calorie Drink Mix
  • No Aspartame

13g

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labeling or contact the manufacturer directly for current data.

entry.title: Super C Singles To Go Orange - .65oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jel Sert
Type: Snacks
Price: 3.99

An All-In-One Boost with Every Essential

      If you need a quick boost to start your day, Super C is the way to go! This delicious Orange flavoured drink packet is full of vitamins and electrolytes to keep you feeling refreshed no matter how long your day is!

     6 packets come in every singles-to-go box. Sugar-free and only 5 calories per pack, this is the perfect pick-me-up on a rough day that'll give you a level of hydration and replenishment water can't give you on its own!

  • 1000mg of Vitamin C
  • Antioxidant Vitamin E
  • 16 Essential Vitamins and Minerals
  • 7 Electrolytes

.65oz

entry.title: Tampico Singles To Go Citrus Punch - .77oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jel Sert
Type: Snacks
Price: 3.99

When Water Isn't Enough

     Stay hydrated with the sweet and tangy taste of Citrus Punch with Tampico Singles-To-Go! Each single-serve pack contains zero sugar, 100% of your Daily Value of Vitamin C, and hardly any calories, making it the perfect pick-me-up no matter what type of day you're having!

     Between the delicious blend of Orange, Lemon, and Tangerine and so many vitamins in every serving, these packets you can take anywhere you go are the perfect way to refresh and replenish.

  • Naturally and Artificially Flavoured
  • Low Calorie
  • Zero Sugar 
  • 100% of your DV of Vitamin C

 

.77oz | 1 box |  6 packets come in every box

entry.title: Cadbury High Lights Low Sugar Hot Chocolate Mix - 154g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cadbury
Type: Snacks
Price: 9.79

Get Cozy with Cadbury Hot Chocolate!

Cadbury Highlights

Low Sugar Cocoa Drink Mix

Time to put your jammies on, get cozy, and warm up during this chilly winter season with Cadbury's Highlights Hot Chocolate. 

A magnificently smooth and delectably hearty cocoa drink. Best prepared with hot milk, for a creamy luscious chocolate beverage and definitive comfortable hot chocolate experience.

With only 38 calories per serving and a low sugar content, this is a truly decadent hot chocolate drink that everyone will love!

154g

Fresh Cadbury Treats Shipped to Canada & the USA!

Ingredients

Sugar, cocoa powder, acidity regulator (potassium carbonates), flavouring. May contain milk. 25% minimum cocoa solids.

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact the manufacturer directly for current data.
